name: شدوا الرحال
description:
شدوا الرحال

لعبة تعليمية للأطفال وتفاعلية لتعليم معالم المسجد الأقصى.

Note: After 11 PM I realized that I forgot to enable music sounds in the game. I submitted the game after several minutes  at 11:08 PM Feb 6 with music sound:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/197v0xr4c14Z2CaPdCUdoGanLTJ9b2jMQ/view?usp=shari...

External Assets Used:

-       Sound Effects (Coin Collect + GameOver) from site https://freesound.org/

- Music from https://youtube.com

-       Old Page Scroll 3D (Model + Textures) from site https://free3d.com/

-       Barded Wires and Fence (Model + Textures)  from site https://sketchfab.com/

-       Asset Store Packages:

o   ADG_Textures Ground Vol 1 (Textures only)

o   Realistic Tree 10 (Models + Textures) (Trees Painted in terrain Game Object)

o   VIASS Free Character Pack (Model + Textures + Animation) (The Textures Edited Palestine flag added) (The code is not ready. I coded the character control with camera movement)
